sentences.en: Caleb was too delicate to specify Mr. Featherstone.
sentences.cn: 凯莱布是个细心人,他故意不提到费瑟斯通先生.

sentences.en: Distance alone is insufficient to specify all properties at space.
sentences.cn: 单靠距离还不足以把空间的所有性质说清楚.

sentences.en: Drag onto the page, then right - click to specify type, as solar.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页上, 然后右击指定类型, 如日光式.

sentences.en: Drag onto the page, then right - click to specify type, such as float.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页上, 然后右击指定类型, 如浮子式.

sentences.en: Enables you to specify when files in Wastebasket are deleted.
sentences.cn: 允许你设定在何时删除回收站中的文件.

sentences.en: Even so, the mode of action of the ethylene so produced is still difficult to specify.
sentences.cn: 即使是如此, 这样产生的乙烯的作用方式仍是难以详细说明的.

sentences.en: For the lateral movement of solids we again need to specify a mechanism.
sentences.cn: 对固体颗粒的横向运动,我们还需提出一种机制.

sentences.en: He might specify the coal - cellar and the woodhouse.
sentences.cn: 他可以特别提出贮煤室和劈柴房来.

sentences.en: If yes, please specify the types of screening and who qualifies.
sentences.cn: 如果回答为“是”, 请详述检测类型和测试人员资质.

sentences.en: Payments will be made for a specified number of months.
sentences.cn: 款项将在规定的几个月内支付。

sentences.en: Please specify what you will do.
sentences.cn: 请你详述一下你将做什么.

sentences.en: Remember to specify your size when ordering clothes.
sentences.cn: 订购服装时记着要详细说明你要的号码。

sentences.en: The optimum density is difficult to specify in terms of trees per acre.
sentences.cn: 很难定论究竟每英亩多少株树为最适密度.

sentences.en: The plaintiffs had done nothing to specify which of these alternatives should be considered.
sentences.cn: 原告们并未具体指出哪一种替代方案应该得到考虑.

sentences.en: They specified a spacious entrance hall.
sentences.cn: 他们明确要求门厅要宽敞。

sentences.en: We have only to specify what meaning blanks and similar characters have.
sentences.cn: 我们只须指出空字符及类似的一些字符具有什么含义.

sentences.en: You must specify the primary key for a table.

words.tran_cn: 特殊的，特定的；明确的；详细的；[药] 具有特效的
[计] 说明符；指示语；[计] 区分符
指定；详细说明（specify的过去分词）
列举,引用,指出,分析,选择,决定
确定,使明确,描述,表现,说明,区别,加标记,命名
指定；详细说明；列举；把…列入说明书

trans.tran_cn: 指定；详细说明；列举；把…列入说明书
trans.tran_en: to state something in an exact and detailed way

trans.tran_cn: 指定，详述，提出…的条件，使具有特性
trans.tran_en: to state something in an exact and detailed way
